synopsis.text: Hige-san, a dedicated office worker, finds himself in an unusual predicament when he wakes up to discover he's been transformed into a baby while still at his desk. To add to his confusion, his colleague Wakabayashi, who normally dons professional attire, strolls into his office in a school uniform. As Hige-san grapples with his newfound infantile form, he realizes that not only has his appearance changed, but his mind has also reverted to that of a baby's. Despite this bizarre situation, Wakabayashi fails to recognize him, leaving Hige-san in a perplexing and comical state. This unaired episode promises a unique blend of humor and mystery, as viewers join Hige-san on his unexpected journey back to infancy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
